dcterms:creator: Matthias Steinstraeter
Johannes Buberger
Dimitar Trifonov
dcterms:description: A dataset comprising 72 unique driving trips performed in a BMW i3 (60 Ah), which includes environmental data, battery data, vehicle driving data, and heating circuit data to predict state-of-charge (SOC) and battery temperature for future time steps.
dcterms:title: Driving trips dataset (BMW i3)
